item.title: OmniHex
item.description: LINKS Presentation of Previous Work (English) Research Proposal (Chinese) Midterm Summary (Chinese) VIDEO DEMO Dev Milestones Upgrade to ROS2: 100% PID and Newton-Euler Dynamics in SITL: 100% Real hardware drivers and maiden flight: 100% Controller architecture and design: 100% Formulate MPC solver using acados: 100% Test MPC solver in Python: 100% L1-MPC python simulation: 0% ROS L1-MPC node: 5% Track trajectories and collect data: 0% Thesis writing: 0% Environment Setup Ubuntu 20.
